item.title: Mentioned by CBC.ca (blog)
item.description:
Warawa to ask committee to overturn all-party ruling on sex-selective abortion vote
After spending the last few days making his case before the cameras, Conservative MP Mark Warawa will finally get his first chance to formally appeal the all-party decision to moot his non-binding motion to condemn sex-selective abortion when he goes ...
